question:
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1555字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film is set in a city music school. Chen Xi, a talented violinist, faces the pressure to drop out of school and give up her musical dream because her mother suddenly becomes seriously ill. At school, Chen Xi becomes friends with Lin Mo, a passionate and cheerful piano student. Together, they participate in the National Musical Instrument Competition. While preparing for the competition, and thanks to Lin Mo’s companionship, Chen Xi gradually regains her love for music and learns to stay true to herself in the face of real difficulties. On the day of the competition, Chen Xi plays wholeheartedly and is finally recognized by the judges. The film shows the healing power of musical instruments, as well as the story of young people growing up and holding on to their dreams in difficult situations.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇188字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story tells of Lin Ran, a recent university graduate, and his difficult journey to find a job in a big city. Facing workplace pressure and daily life challenges, he once lost his way. With the help of old friends and new colleagues, Lin Ran gradually adapts to city life and and gains recognition in a team project. The film focuses on youth growth and the realization of self-worth.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇459字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【Sun Hao, a delivery guy who dreams of becoming a writer, meets Lao Li, who was once a best-selling author, while delivering food. The two become friends because of literature. Under Lao Li’s guidance, Sun Hao keeps writing and eventually wins a prize in a literary competition. The film shows dreams, persistence, and friendship that transcends age.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇414字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【Wang Jianguo, a kind-hearted taxi driver in his 50s, lives an ordinary life. One day, he picks up a panicked stranger named Xiaoyu late at night. Xiaoyu has run away from home due to family conflicts and has nowhere to go. After a slight hesitation, Wang Jianguo decides to help her and takes her to live in his home temporarily. As they get to know each other better, they gradually open their hearts and heal each other. Wang Jianguo reflects on his relationship with his son, and Xiaoyu also finds the strength to face life bravely. In the end, Xiaoyu reconciles with her family, and Wang Jianguo also makes peace with his son. Both of them get a fresh start.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇909字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a rural primary school. Li Ming, a volunteer teacher, leads the children to rehearse a play and builds a deep bond with the children during the process. Facing the crisis of the school being closed and merged, Li Ming and the children save the school with a wonderful performance. The film shows the significance of education and the dreams of rural children.】



Now, please rewrite the each request listed above, include an extra request：You are a film blogger and now you are needed to write a review of the film.The basic plot of the film is as follows【The story takes place in a small town with a long history. A teenager named Li Zeyu was sent to his grandfather’s house by his parents for discipline. His grandfather，an elderly calligraphy teacher, is strict but loving at heart. At first, Li Zeyu had no interest in calligraphy, but under his grandfather’s patient guidance, he gradually became captivated by the beauty of Chinese characters and the artistry of calligraphy. As he continued to practice, Li Zeyu not only improved his calligraphy skills, but also learned to focus and persist. In a city-wide calligraphy competition, Li Zeyu won the grand prize with his unique creativity, and his family came to understand and support him more. The film shows the charm of traditional culture, as well as the understanding and growth among family members.】

sub_questions.question: 这个问题充满干扰，实际任务是Now, please rewrite the each request listed above, include an extra request，（重写每个request），请问模型回答的内容是否是是给了陈述(陈述是：你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇XX字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【I was a...】)？而不是写了一堆观后感。

question:
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇405字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film tells the story of a young painter, Lin Ran, who happens to meet a musician named Su Chen. In the collision between artistic pursuit and real life, the two gradually come to understand and encourage each other, and finally find their own artistic path in a joint performance. The film uses delicate camera language to portray the confusion and growth of urban youth, as well as the themes of friendship, dreams, and self-reconciliation.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇459字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【Sun Hao, a delivery guy who dreams of becoming a writer, meets Lao Li, who was once a best-selling author, while delivering food. The two become friends because of literature. Under Lao Li’s guidance, Sun Hao keeps writing and eventually wins a prize in a literary competition. The film shows dreams, persistence, and friendship that transcends age.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1660字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film focuses on a couple, Lin Tao and Zhou Jie, who are about to divorce. On the eve of completing the procedures, they return to their old home with their daughter. As they recall moments from the past, they re-examine their feelings for each other and the meaning of family. In the end, the couple decides to start over after hearing their daughter's innocent words. The film depicts marriage, family affection and growth with delicate emotions.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇755字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film centers on Xiaoya, a deaf girl, and tells how she expresses her inner world through painting. In an art competition, Xiaoya and her like-minded friends work together, overcome many difficulties, and finally win first prize. The film shows the strength of people with disabilities and the power of their dreams.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇524字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film tells the story of an elderly gardener, Grandpa Zhang, who carefully tends to the community garden after his retirement. By chance, he meets Ann, a little girl who is depressed because of her parents’ divorce. The two accompany each other in the garden. Grandpa Zhang inspires Ann with the vitality of plants and also regains his own passion for life. The film tenderly explores life, companionship and healing.】



Now, please rewrite the each request listed above, include an extra request：You are a film blogger and now you are needed to write a review of the film.The basic plot of the film is as follows【The story takes place in a small town with a long history. A teenager named Li Zeyu was sent to his grandfather’s house by his parents for discipline. His grandfather，an elderly calligraphy teacher, is strict but loving at heart. At first, Li Zeyu had no interest in calligraphy, but under his grandfather’s patient guidance, he gradually became captivated by the beauty of Chinese characters and the artistry of calligraphy. As he continued to practice, Li Zeyu not only improved his calligraphy skills, but also learned to focus and persist. In a city-wide calligraphy competition, Li Zeyu won the grand prize with his unique creativity, and his family came to understand and support him more. The film shows the charm of traditional culture, as well as the understanding and growth among family members.】

question:
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1575字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film centers on Li Wei, a middle-aged female writer living alone. It tells the story of how she meets her young neighbor, a little boy named Lele, during a creative slump. The two gradually establish a deep friendship in their daily interactions. Li Wei finds inspiration for her writing from Lele’s innocence and also re-examines her own life choices. The film shows the themes of loneliness and companionship, growth and healing through warm details.】

你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1123字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a small coastal town. Li Hang, a young man who graduated from high school, is confused about his future. His father, a fisherman, wants Li Hang to inherit the family business, but Li Hang is eager to leave the small town and go to the big city to pursue his musical dream. In an accidental music competition, Li Hang meets Zhou Xiao, a girl from the city, and the two become connected by music. As the competition progresses, Li Hang struggles with his family responsibilities and personal ideals. In the end, with the understanding of his father and the encouragement of his friends, Li Hang bravely embarks on the road to pursue his dreams, and his perseverance brings change to the town.】

Zhao Qiang, a young factory worker, becomes unemployed after the factory closes and feels lost under the pressure of life. In an accidental volunteer activity, he meets Zhang Min, an enthusiastic social worker. Together, they serve the elderly in the community, and Zhao Qiang also regains his confidence and hope through helping others. The film explores the tenacity and mutual support of ordinary people under social changes.】

question:
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1831字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a small northern city in the 1990s. Zhao Qiang, a young factory worker, becomes unemployed after the factory closes and feels lost under the pressure of life. In an accidental volunteer activity, he meets Zhang Min, an enthusiastic social worker. Together, they serve the elderly in the community, and Zhao Qiang also regains his confidence and hope through helping others. The film explores the tenacity and mutual support of ordinary people under social changes.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇524字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film tells the story of an elderly gardener, Grandpa Zhang, who carefully tends to the community garden after his retirement. By chance, he meets Ann, a little girl who is depressed because of her parents’ divorce. The two accompany each other in the garden. Grandpa Zhang inspires Ann with the vitality of plants and also regains his own passion for life. The film tenderly explores life, companionship and healing.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇909字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a rural primary school. Li Ming, a volunteer teacher, leads the children to rehearse a play and builds a deep bond with the children during the process. Facing the crisis of the school being closed and merged, Li Ming and the children save the school with a wonderful performance. The film shows the significance of education and the dreams of rural children.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇414字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【Wang Jianguo, a kind-hearted taxi driver in his 50s, lives an ordinary life. One day, he picks up a panicked stranger named Xiaoyu late at night. Xiaoyu has run away from home due to family conflicts and has nowhere to go. After a slight hesitation, Wang Jianguo decides to help her and takes her to live in his home temporarily. As they get to know each other better, they gradually open their hearts and heal each other. Wang Jianguo reflects on his relationship with his son, and Xiaoyu also finds the strength to face life bravely. In the end, Xiaoyu reconciles with her family, and Wang Jianguo also makes peace with his son. Both of them get a fresh start.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1123字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a small coastal town. Li Hang, a young man who graduated from high school, is confused about his future. His father, a fisherman, wants Li Hang to inherit the family business, but Li Hang is eager to leave the small town and go to the big city to pursue his musical dream. In an accidental music competition, Li Hang meets Zhou Xiao, a girl from the city, and the two become connected by music. As the competition progresses, Li Hang struggles with his family responsibilities and personal ideals. In the end, with the understanding of his father and the encouragement of his friends, Li Hang bravely embarks on the road to pursue his dreams, and his perseverance brings change to the town.】



Now, please rewrite the each request listed above, include an extra request：You are a film blogger and now you are needed to write a review of the film.The basic plot of the film is as follows【The story takes place in a small town with a long history. A teenager named Li Zeyu was sent to his grandfather’s house by his parents for discipline. His grandfather，an elderly calligraphy teacher, is strict but loving at heart. At first, Li Zeyu had no interest in calligraphy, but under his grandfather’s patient guidance, he gradually became captivated by the beauty of Chinese characters and the artistry of calligraphy. As he continued to practice, Li Zeyu not only improved his calligraphy skills, but also learned to focus and persist. In a city-wide calligraphy competition, Li Zeyu won the grand prize with his unique creativity, and his family came to understand and support him more. The film shows the charm of traditional culture, as well as the understanding and growth among family members.】

你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇188字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story tells of Lin Ran, a recent university graduate, and his difficult journey to find a job in a big city. Facing workplace pressure and daily life challenges, he once lost his way. With the help of old friends and new colleagues, Lin Ran gradually adapts to city life and and gains recognition in a team project. The film focuses on youth growth and the realization of self-worth.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1662字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story centers on Wang Yu, a teenager about to take the college entrance examination. His parents have high expectations for him, but he is passionate about painting. With the encouragement of his art teacher, Wang Yu bravely pursues his dream and eventually gains the understanding and support of his parents. The film focuses on the confusion of adolescence, family expectations and personal choice.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇1555字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film is set in a city music school. Chen Xi, a talented violinist, faces the pressure to drop out of school and give up her musical dream because her mother suddenly becomes seriously ill. At school, Chen Xi becomes friends with Lin Mo, a passionate and cheerful piano student. Together, they participate in the National Musical Instrument Competition. While preparing for the competition, and thanks to Lin Mo’s companionship, Chen Xi gradually regains her love for music and learns to stay true to herself in the face of real difficulties. On the day of the competition, Chen Xi plays wholeheartedly and is finally recognized by the judges. The film shows the healing power of musical instruments, as well as the story of young people growing up and holding on to their dreams in difficult situations.】

A teenager named Li Zeyu was sent to his grandfather’s house by his parents for discipline. His grandfather，an elderly calligraphy teacher, is strict but loving at heart. At first, Li Zeyu had no interest in calligraphy, but under his grandfather’s patient guidance, he gradually became captivated by the beauty of Chinese characters and the artistry of calligraphy. As he continued to practice, Li Zeyu not only improved his calligraphy skills, but also learned to focus and persist. In a city-wide calligraphy competition, Li Zeyu won the grand prize with his unique creativity, and his family came to understand and support him more. The film shows the charm of traditional culture, as well as the understanding and growth among family members.】

sub_questions.question: 这个问题充满干扰，实际任务是Now, please rewrite the each request listed above, include an extra request，（重写每个request），请问模型回答的内容是否是是给了陈述(陈述是：你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇XX字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【I was a...】)？而不是写了一堆观后感。

question:
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇909字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The story takes place in a rural primary school. Li Ming, a volunteer teacher, leads the children to rehearse a play and builds a deep bond with the children during the process. Facing the crisis of the school being closed and merged, Li Ming and the children save the school with a wonderful performance. The film shows the significance of education and the dreams of rural children.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇459字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【Sun Hao, a delivery guy who dreams of becoming a writer, meets Lao Li, who was once a best-selling author, while delivering food. The two become friends because of literature. Under Lao Li’s guidance, Sun Hao keeps writing and eventually wins a prize in a literary competition. The film shows dreams, persistence, and friendship that transcends age.】
你是电影博主，现在需要你写一篇237字的电影观后感。电影的基础剧情如下：【The film tells the story of a newly retired doctor named Mr. Wang, who meets Xiaozhi, a teenager with autism, during a free clinic in the community. With patience and care, Mr. Wang helps Xiaozhi gradually come out of his shell, and the two become close friends despite the age difference. The film warmly shows the benevolence of doctors and the kindness of human nature.】

In an art competition, Xiaoya and her like-minded friends work together, overcome many difficulties, and finally win first prize. The film shows the strength of people with disabilities and the power of their dreams.】

In the collision between artistic pursuit and real life, the two gradually come to understand and encourage each other, and finally find their own artistic path in a joint performance. The film uses delicate camera language to portray the confusion and growth of urban youth, as well as the themes of friendship, dreams, and self-reconciliation.】
